basic.description: The electrophysiology and biophysics of neuronal and cardiac membranes; molecular biology, structure, and function of ion channels.  Students will learn to critically evaluate scientific literature.  Instructional format is primarily student-led seminars.  N. Magoski.  Enrolment is limited.  (Offered even years only jointly with PHGY 424).
basic.subject: PHGY
basic.title: Ion Channel Of Excitable Cells
